Hör av dig till oss och upptäck hur vi kan hjälpa dig att ta nästa steg i din karriär!

title: Product Designer (UX/UI)
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Job Description**
 Create intuitive and user-centered design solutions.
   

  

 Develop and maintain design principles and guidelines for the team.
   

  

 Collaborate with developers and stakeholders to iterate and improve products.
   

  

**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* At least 5 years of experience as a product designer, UI/UX designer, or similar role.
* End-User Experience: Minimum 3 years of experience working with end-user products and services.
* Tools: Experience with design tools such as Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD.
* A strong portfolio showing an understanding of user-centered design.
* Experience with wireframing, prototyping, and user testing.
* Knowledge of design principles for both mobile and web.
* Additional: Strong communication skills and the ability to justify design decisions with data and insights.


**Application deadline:** 
 09-03-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Product & Brand Designer
description:
**Shape the future of the Next Generation Crypto Bank**
 Safello is growing fast. We’re evolving our
 **product, brand, and offering** 
 , and we’re looking for a
 **Product & Brand Designer** 
 to play a central role in that transformation.
   

  

 At Safello,
 **our brand is our product** 
 . Every screen, interaction, and visual detail creates the sense of clarity and trust that we build. We need a designer who is
 **visionary but also hands-on** 
 —someone who sees what’s possible and can take an idea all the way from concept to a polished, seamless experience.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Shape the visual identity of our product, creating a modern, cohesive, and engaging experience.
* Refine and evolve the UI, making sure Safello’s design feels effortless, intuitive, and distinctly our own.
* Bridge brand and product, ensuring that every design choice reinforces clarity, trust, and ease of use.
* Work closely with UX, development, and marketing to bring Safello’s design vision to life across every touchpoint.
* Take ownership of our design system, ensuring a scalable and consistent product experience.
* Explore and push boundaries, finding new ways to make Safello feel unique, innovative, and future-forward.


**Who You Are**
* A product designer with a strong UI and interaction design focus.
* A visionary designer—you see the bigger picture but love to get hands-on with the details.
* Experience with fintech, crypto, or other trust-based products is a plus, but not a requirement.
* Have designed for products that people love using, preferably in tech, e-commerce, or digital services.
* Detail-oriented—typography, spacing, micro-interactions, and motion matter to you.
* Fluent in modern design tools like Figma, Adobe Suite, and motion/interaction tools.


**Why Join Safello?**
**Your design will shape Safello.** 
 We’re building
 **The Next Generation Crypto Bank** 
 , and you’ll have a key role in defining how it looks and feels.
   

  

* A product-first company. Here, design isn’t just a function—it’s a competitive advantage.
* A culture that values craft. We care about every pixel, every animation, and every interaction.
* A chance to challenge and build the future. We’re not thinking like a traditional bank—we’re building something completely new.
* Embracing AI and its role in design—leveraging AI-driven tools to enhance creativity, efficiency, and innovation.


 Sounds like you? Let’s talk. Or if you know someone who’d be a perfect fit, send them our way.

title: Senior UI Designer – E-commerce Focus
description:
We are looking for a highly skilled
 **Senior UI Designer** 
 with
 **UX Expertise** 
 and strong visual design background to join our Experience Design team. This role is ideal for someone who excels at crafting
 **high-quality, visually compelling interfaces** 
 and has extensive experience in
 **e-commerce design, Figma, and design systems** 
 . You will report to the
 **Head of Experience Design** 
 , and collaborate closely with our
 **Experience Consulting team** 
 to create exceptional digital experiences.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
**Visual and UI Design Excellence:**
* Design pixel-perfect, visually striking user interfaces that elevate the user experience.
* Maintain a strong focus on aesthetics, typography, color theory, and layout.
* Ensure consistency across projects by contributing to and refining design systems.
* Develop engaging and scalable UI solutions tailored to e-commerce experiences.


**UX & User-Centered Design**
* Create intuitive and seamless user flows that enhance the overall shopping experience.
* Conduct usability testing and iterate based on user feedback to improve designs.
* Optimize e-commerce interfaces for conversion, engagement, and retention.
* Ensure designs align with user research insights and client business objectives.


**Prototyping & Interaction Design**
* Build and refine interactive prototypes in Figma to communicate design concepts.
* Ensure smooth interaction patterns and micro-interactions that enhance usability.


**E-commerce & Design Systems**
* Apply expertise in e-commerce UI/UX best practices to optimize user flows, product pages, and checkout experiences.
* Work with complex design systems (e.g., Alokai Storefront UI 2.5+, Material UI, or similar).
* Ensure that designs adhere to accessibility standards (WCAG) and are responsive across devices.


**Collaboration & Communication**
* Work closely with UX designers, developers, and stakeholders to bring design visions to life.
* Confidently present design concepts and rationale to clients and team members.
* Iterate on designs based on user testing, data insights, and client feedback.


**Qualifications**
* 5+ years of experience in UI/UX design with strong visual skills.
* Your portfolio should showcase exceptional visual design across digital platforms and a proven track record in designing e-commerce interfaces that drive engagement and conversions.
* Advanced Figma skills, including components, variables, auto layout, and prototyping.
* Experience with design systems, UI principles, and best practices.
* Experience with user research, usability testing, and UX optimization.
* Basic knowledge of HTML & CSS is a plus.
* Experience designing for accessibility (WCAG standards).
* Strong communication skills with the ability to articulate design decisions effectively.
* Fluency in English and Swedish is required; Norwegian is a plus.


**Personal Attributes**
* Creative Mindset: Ability to think creatively and come up with innovative design solutions.
* Team Player: Enjoys working collaboratively with others and contributing to a positive team environment. We are a team that likes to have fun :)
* Proactive: Self-motivated and able to manage your workload effectively, with a willingness to take on new challenges.
* Client-Focused: Comfortable in client-facing roles and able to adapt designs to meet client needs and preferences.


**What We Offer**
* Exciting projects with major clients where your designs will have real impact.
* A strong culture characterised by openness, teamwork, excellence, and fun.
* Flexible work environment with access to modern offices in Stockholm and remote work options.
* You will be working closely with amazing design experts, offering opportunities for continuous learning and professional growth within the company. Also, you will have access to educational resources and workshops to expand your skills in UX/UI design and related fields.
* Inclusive Environment: We welcome diverse backgrounds and perspectives, valuing what makes each team member unique.


**Join Us!**
 If you are a creative, detail-oriented designer with a passion for high-quality visuals and user-centered design, we want to hear from you! A portfolio is required. Please submit your application along with a brief note on why you’re the perfect fit for this role.

title: Designer - Stockholm
description:
**About Us**
 At Twigeo, we’re on a mission to craft innovative and impactful digital marketing campaigns. With a growth-driven mindset, we thrive at the intersection of creativity and strategy, delivering measurable results while pushing the boundaries of what’s possible.
   

  

**The Opportunity**
 As a Designer at Twigeo, you will contribute to multiple brands from a creative and visual design perspective, ensuring impact for target audiences. This involves executing digital marketing campaigns, maintaining client relationships, and actively contributing to the evolution of our creative practice. You'll also be a key contributor to our global creative team, pushing the boundaries of craft and technology.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
**Design and execution**
* Develop impactful marketing assets for multiple media channels (images, banners, videos, paid/organic social).
* Present ideas and creatives with dynamic storytelling


**Cross-collaboration**
* Collaborate with the other creatives and functions to align visuals with messaging and strategy.


**Foster client relationships**
* Maintain client expectations and communication with brand/marketing teams through presentations and regular updates.
* Lead creative meetings + brainstorms to build/maintain trust.


**Innovation**
* Stay ahead of best practices and trends while continuously expanding your knowledge of emerging tools and techniques to enhance design quality and efficiency.
* A “yes, and” mindset that contributes to a continuous feedback culture.


 If this sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you!
   

  

**What You’ll Bring**
* 3+ years of experience as a digital graphic or motion designer.
* Knowledge of motion design principles.
* Proficiency in Figma and Adobe Suite (After Effects).
* Awareness of AI tools like Midjourney and ChatGPT/Claude.
* Experience in an agency, start up, or similar environments.
* Strong communication skills and experience working cross functionally
* Familiarity with digital marketing KPIs, industry best practices and all major marketing channels (Meta, Google, Apple, Snapchat, Twitter.)


**Why Join Twigeo?**
* Collaborate with a creative team to bring ideas to life.
* Be a part of a growth agency on a journey to expand its creative offering
* Work with a dynamic team passionate about innovation and measurable impact.
* Collaborate on campaigns for diverse clients, combining strategy and creativity.


**What We Offer**
* Generous Time Off: Enjoy 30 paid vacation days to recharge
* Wellness contribution: 5000 sek/yearly to support your well-being
* Flexible Work Environment: Thrive in a hybrid working model that balances collaboration and flexibility. Office days are Tuesdays-Thursdays
* Growth Opportunities: Advance your career in a dynamic environment that encourages skill development and innovation
* Recognition and Impact: Join a workplace where your ideas are valued, your voice is heard, and your contributions make a difference


**Ready to take the next step in your career?** 
 Join us in shaping the future of marketing.

title: Senior UX Designer
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 UX-designern kommer att ansvara för att ta fram nya konceptuella lösningar i samband med utveckling av ny det nya systemet och säkerställa att det nya systemet blir användarvänliga, visuellt tilltalande och smidiga att interagera med. Personen vi söker är noggrann, har lätt för att samarbeta och har förmåga att anpassa sitt arbetssätt och prioritera uppgifter.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* UX-designer med +10 års erfarenhet av att designa digitala produkter från privat eller offentlig sektor
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att arbeta agilt (+5år)
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att leda UX-workshops (+10 år)
* Kan arbeta obehindrat i Azure DevOps
* Ska kunna ta fram ett GUI för slutprodukt, inklusive Figmakomponenter som kan återanvändas
* Kan tillhandahålla UX-writing och producera utbildningsmaterial
* Kunna hantera mark-down för innehållspublicering och arbeta i VS-code
* Erfarenhet av användarintervjuer
* God kunskap om tillgänglighet
* Kommunikativ
* Goda kunskaper i svenska, både i tal och skrift


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 04-03-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Product Manager
description:
**Who We Are**
 Paligo is an industry-leading SaaS company in the field of Component Content Management Systems (CCMS). We empower global teams to create, manage, translate and publish technical documentation using our cloud-based platform. Trusted by Fortune 500 companies such as Amazon, Allianz, Mitsubishi, the European Commission, and Gong, our goal is to become the top solution in our industry.
   

  

 Paligo is a
 **global company** 
 with clients and teams spread across different locations, but our engineering & product teams are primarily based in Solna, where we prioritize
 **in-office collaboration** 
 . We embrace a
 **hybrid working model** 
 , allowing for regular in-office meetings while offering flexibility for remote work when needed. However, the heart of our teamwork happens in
 **Stockholm** 
 .
   

  

 We are looking for exceptional individuals like YOU to take us to the next level!
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Product Manager at Paligo, you'll join our talented team at Paligo's headquarters in Solna, Stockholm. You will take ownership of a designated product area and based on your knowledge and interactions with our customers, partner with your product development team to develop our product together. Your goal will be to help build and develop a product that delights our customers and solve real world problems for our users.
   

  

**Your Key Responsibilities**
* Take ownership of your product area ensuring alignment with Paligo’s larger business goals and customer needs.
* Based on customer-centric development, work closely with customers to understand their pain points, gather feedback, and prioritize functionality.
* Collaborating across Engineering, UX design, Marketing, and Sales teams to deliver world-class usability and solutions.
* Make sure we communicate clearly with our users and buyers regarding the benefits of Paligo and how our continuous development helps them succeed with our product.
* Market research, stay ahead of industry trends and competitors to identify opportunities for innovation.
* Apply data-driven decisions, analyze user behavior, product performance, and metrics to guide product enhancements.


**About You**
 We are looking for a
 **Product Manager** 
 with
 **excellent communication skills** 
 who can understand and explain customer problems and requests at different levels, depending on the audience. You should be comfortable communicating both
 **externally with customers** 
 and
 **internally within the team** 
 , and possess strong stakeholder management skills.
   

  

 Because of Paligo’s growth, we need a team player who thrives in a
 **fast-paced environment** 
 and is willing to
 **roll up their sleeves** 
 and contribute wherever needed. You enjoy
 **cross-functional collaboration** 
 and are a people person who values social interaction and teamwork. Whether online or in-person, you communicate
 **clearly, positively, and objectively** 
 with ease.
   

  

 To succeed in this role, you should be
 **problem-solving, analytical, and practical** 
 when facing challenges. You have an analytical mindset with a data-driven approach to problem-solving. As a true team player, you understand that
 **everyone at Paligo works toward the same goal** 
 , regardless of their role or location.
   

  

**Your Background**
* Experience with B2B SaaS platforms, including managing the product lifecycle for complex software applications.
* Proven experience of discovering customer problems and delivering customer value as a Product Manager.
* A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business or a similar relevant field.
* Fluency in Business English.


**Nice-to-Haves**
* Familiarity with CCMS, CMS or related content and document management technologies.
* Fluency in Swedish or additional languages.
* Knowledge of system integration work would be a plus.


**What We Offer**
 At Paligo, you’ll be at the
 **bridge between our customers and our product development team** 
 , working in a dynamic and innovative environment. We offer:
   

  

* Impactful Work – Your contribution will directly shape Paligo’s growth and make a tangible difference in our customers’ success.
* A Collaborative Culture – We prioritize open communication, teamwork, and knowledge-sharing.
* Competitive Benefits & Flexible Hours – Because work-life balance is essential.
* Professional Growth – Opportunities to learn, develop, and take on exciting challenges.
* Health & Well-being Initiatives – We value a culture that supports both mental and physical well-being.


 Paligo is an end-to-end Component Content Management System (CCMS) solution for technical documentation, policies and procedures, knowledge management, and more.

title: Product Owner / Delivery Lead
description:
*Vi söker en produktfokuserad Delivery Lead eller en leveransfokuserad Product Owner för Bflow Systems. Din passion är att leverera så mycket kundvärde så snabbt och effektivt som möjligt. Du kommer att vara nyckelperson i planering och utveckling av Bflow, samt säkerställa smidigt och kreativt samarbete inom ett tvär-funktionellt* 
*litet* 
*internationellt team.* 




  





*Vill du vara en del av en tillväxtresa som bara börjat, och stötta Sveriges företagare mot framgång? Ansök idag!* 




  





**Om oss** 




 På Bflow Systems sätter vi användaren först. Världen förändras ständigt, därför behöver vi medarbetare som är anpassningsbara och passionerade över att ständigt förbättra förutsättningarna för Sveriges företagare. Vi gör det genom att tillhöra Sveriges snabbaste ekonomikoncern Freedom Group. Teamet är distribuerat över Sverige och Polen. 
 



  





 Freedom Group stöttar företagare över hela Sverige mot framgång. Att driva företag ska vara enkelt. Med Freedom Group som ekonomipartner kan företagaren fokusera på det de gör bäst – driva sitt företag – medan våra kompetenta konsulter stöttar hela eller delar av ekonomiavdelningen, med tjänster som exempelvis ekonomisk planering, redovisning, bokslut, skatt, lönehantering, finansiering. 
 



  





 Vårt koncerninterna ekonomisystem Bflow gör vardagen smidigare både för både företagare och de ekonomikonsulter som stöttar dem. Med nästa generationens teknik och enkla gränssnitt automatiserar och effektiviserar Bflow de vanligaste arbetsmomenten för att frigöra tid till värdeskapande aktiviteter. Företagaren får helt enkelt bättra förutsättningar att lyckas med sin verksamhet.
 



  





**Om dig** 




 Du är en leveransfokuserad Product Owner eller en produktfokuserad Delivery Lead, med en passion för att leverera så mycket kundvärde så snabbt och friktionsfritt som möjligt. Du är van vid dynamiskt snabbväxande organisationer med höga krav på att leverera värde mot användare. Du vet hur man maximerar värde mot kund med minimal administration för teamet. 
 



  





*Dina ansvarsområden* 




 • Du underhåller och prioriterar produktbackloggen tillsammans med produktägare/branschexperter/utvecklare/UX. Du säkerställer såklart att backloggen alltid är uppdaterad, tydlig och reflekterar organisationens prioritering.
 



 • Du planerar och faciliterar sprintplaneringsmöten, backlog refinement och retrospektiv för att både säkerställa att vi bygger rätt sak för kunden, att vi bygger mjukvaran på rätt sätt och att vi fungerar som team. 
 



 • Du samarbetar med utvecklingsteamet för att skapa en realistisk sprintplan och säkerställa att teamet har rätt förutsättningar att leverera. Du säkerställer att utvecklarna vet vad de ska göra, och att arbetsbelastningen är jämn över teamet.
 



 • Du leder dagliga stand-ups med teamet och övervakar iterativt sprintframsteg för att identifiera eventuella hinder eller behov av justeringar.
 



 • Du håller dig ajour kring moderna arbetssätt och utbildar teamet när det behövs för att säkerställa att vi alltid arbetar effektivt. 
 



 • Du arbetar nära CTO och Head of Product och fungerar som en brygga mellan affär, teknik, branschexpertis. Du stöttar CTO och Head of Product i framtagande av produktroadmap, produktstrategi och långsiktig planering. 
 



  





*Vad vi söker hos dig* 




 • Du är en erfaren produktägare, delivery lead, eller tech lead med dokumenterade resultat från snabbväxande miljöer. 
 



 • Du har en genuin passion för att ständigt förbättra kundvärden, utvecklingsprocesser, verktyg, teamkänsla.  
 



 • Du har en mycket god förmåga att hantera och prioritera en backlog baserat på affärsvärde och kundbehov. 
 



 • Du har en stark kommunikationsförmåga och god vana av att samarbeta med både tekniska och icke-tekniska team. 
 



 • Du är mycket lösningsorienterad och proaktiv – du gillar att identifiera och lösa problem innan de blir hinder.
 



  





*Minimikvalifikationer:* 




 • Kandidatexamen eller motsvarande praktisk erfarenhet.
 



 • Minst 3 års erfarenhet av att framgångsrikt arbeta tvärfunktionellt med utvecklingsteam, UX/UI, affärsutveckling, ledning och andra intressenter.
 



 • Minst 2 års erfarenhet av att leda produktutveckling i roller som Product Owner, Tech Lead eller Delivery Lead.
 



 • Erfarenhet av verktyg som Jira, Confluence, Slack. 
 



 • Du pratar och skriver flytande på både engelska och svenska.
 



  





*Meriterande kvalifikationer:* 




 • Magisterexamen inom ett teknik- eller affärsrelaterat område.
 



 • Minst 2 års erfarenhet av att framgångsrikt ta tekniska produkter från koncept till lansering.
 



 • Minst 5 års erfarenhet av att arbeta tvärfunktionellt i en internationell miljö, samt erfarenhet av att definiera KPI:er/mätvärden, analysera resultat, generera insikter och kommunicera resultat till organisationen.
 



 • Erfarenhet av GitLab, Amazon.
 



 • Erfarenhet av att arbeta med - eller bygga - ekonomisystem, såsom exempelvis Fortnox, Kleer, Visma.
 



 • Erfarenhet av att arbeta på en ekonomifunktion eller som ekonomikonsult exempelvis inom redovisning, finansiering, controller, mm.

title: Principal Product Designer
description:
At Viaplay Group, we entertain millions of people every day through our streaming services, radio networks, and TV channels. We believe in the power of content not just as a way of telling stories and touching lives, but also expanding worlds.
   

  

 We’re looking for the best people to join us on our journey. Right now, we’re searching for a
 **Principal Product Designer** 
 in our
 **Stockholm** 
 office – are you ready to hit play on an exciting career change?
   

  

**The Role**
 As a Principal Product Designer, you will be focused on driving the vision and overall strategy of Product Design at Viaplay as well as elevating the product across mobile, web and TV in a newly formed team whose mission is to create visually dynamic and engaging experience for our customers. In your role, you will ensure we have an efficient and sustainable strategy for product design across all platforms.
   

  

 You will split your time being hands-on within a cross-functional team, and collaborate closely with the design guild and the other platform guilds to ensure best design practices and processes. You will work to ensure a brand-wide consistency and delightful experience for our customers now and in the future. You will design cutting-edge concepts as well as feature improvements, and it will all provide lots of challenges and fun.
   

  

 You will ensure our design solutions are aligned with industry standards, accessibility guidelines, and modern design frameworks. You stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies to continuously elevate our design standards.
   

  

**What We’re Looking For**
 We are looking for a designer with a strong portfolio in digital product design. You are passionate about pushing the boundaries, have a solid experience in multi-platform design, are a strong advocate for the design process, and want to be part of a fun team working to transform the streaming experience for our customers.
   

  

**More Specifically, You Have**
* Experience: Strong background working with user experience and user interface design, preferably at various companies
* Platform knowledge: Experience designing for mobile, tablets and web
* Collaboration: Experience working in cross-functional teams. Eager to include other designers, researchers, product managers, developers, and stakeholders in the design process to gather input and diverse perspectives
* UI: Confident creating visual designs based on company brand guidelines and design system
* UX: Incorporate design principles and apply intuitive user-centric design solutions based on user insights gathered from quantitative and qualitative research
* Design process: Experience contributing to the complete product development lifecycle. Familiar with different design methods and ability to apply and adapt
* Tool: Expert knowledge of Figma as it is the main design tool we use in the company
* Research: Knowledge and experience conducting qualitative and quantitative research (e.g. User interviews, usability testings, surveys)
* Design system: Creating and maintaining
* Prototyping: Using various design tools to create prototypes to communicate and validate design solutions
* Experience with Stakeholder management
* Experience working with Design Strategy


 What we offer you
   

  

* We’ve got you covered! 30 days of paid vacation every year, an attractive pension and insurance scheme, and generous parental leave pay lift.
* Your wellbeing matters. We provide you with various wellbeing initiatives including wellness allowance.
* A safe space to grow and up-skill. Our learning culture puts you in the driver’s seat of your own development.
* An innovative environment with Hack Days once a year. This week-long initiative allows you to think outside the box and deliver creative, technical solutions that (more often than not) go on to be implemented, either in our product or our ways of working.
* Entertainment is what we love, and entertainment is what we do. So, unlimited access to Viaplay seems only fair for you to get to know the product – including serier & viewing events, new release movie rentals, linear channels and more.


**Hit play** 
**today**
 If this feels like your kind of challenge, make sure you apply by attaching your CV here – you may also want to add your LinkedIn profile. Please don’t send us your application via email because we won’t be able to accept it. We do, however, welcome any questions you may have about this particular position.
   

  

 Want to learn more about who we are and what we do? Check out our careers page or follow us on Instagram! We’re only ever a few clicks away.

title: Product Manager – Sellers Onboarding
description:
**At Hemnet, we believe that our most important task is to make everyone’s journey to find a new home as smooth, easy, and efficient as possible. We aim to facilitate the sellers' ability to reach every buyer and give the buyers access to all available homes for sale. In short, we believe in an open housing market that benefits everybody.** 
  

  

 We are on a mission to create a smooth and insightful seller journey that is unique for Hemnet and maximizes the seller's chances for a successful sale. We’re looking for a Product Manager to drive the strategy and execution of our seller onboarding experience. In this role, you’ll collaborate with cross-functional teams to balance the needs of our users, the business, and the product—ensuring a superior experience for hundreds of thousands of sellers every year. Your main focus will be to ensure users get a smooth onboarding experience when choosing to list on Hemnet. The work involves improving the user journey, personalizing communication, and optimizing conversion in the different steps.
   

  

**What You’ll Do** 
  

  

* Strategic Leadership: Define the product vision and long-term goals, aligning with Hemnet’s overall objectives.
* Collaboration: Work hand-in-hand with tech, UX, analytics, and other stakeholders to integrate strategies and deliver successful go-to-market plans.
* Customer Focus: Leverage customer insights and data to refine and personalize the seller flows and funnels through discovery, testing, and iterative improvements.
* Team Empowerment: Inspire and guide your team to challenge assumptions, prioritize effectively, and collaborate seamlessly across departments.
* Problem Solving: Navigate ambiguity with adaptive communication and decisive action, ensuring impactful and clear outcomes.
* Continuous Improvement: Embrace feedback as a tool for both personal and team growth, constantly refining processes to drive excellence.


  

  

**Who We’re Looking For** 
  

  

* Relevant experience in product management or similar, preferably from tech scale-ups or mature companies with commercial product exposure.
* Proven expertise in creating product strategy and vision, and experience with Agile product development
* Strong background in product discovery and user research, with a data-driven approach to decision making.
* Excellent stakeholder management skills and the ability to lead and inspire cross-functional teams.
* Bonus: Hands-on technical experience and familiarity with Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO).


  

  

****🏡** 
 Your career at Hemnet** 
  

  

 Are you ready to play a meaningful role in one of the biggest decisions people make in life? If so – welcome to Hemnet! Since 1998, we’ve taken pride in making the life-changing, often stressful journey of finding a new home as smooth and enjoyable as possible.
   

  

 At Hemnet, our mission is to connect every seller with every buyer, empower buyers to discover every home for sale, and enable real estate agents to match seamlessly with sellers. With over 40 million monthly visits, we’re Sweden’s most popular property platform and the first choice for Swedes looking to buy or sell a home. Together, we’re creating an open, transparent housing market, making home transactions in Sweden among the most efficient in the world.
   

  

 Our success is built on a strong, friendly culture that values creativity, inclusivity, and collaboration. Hemnet is a place where everyone has a voice, and our welcoming environment helps you thrive and grow as you work alongside passionate colleagues from around the globe.
   

  

**A Hybrid Way of Working** 
  

  

 Our vibrant office in central Stockholm is the hub of our collaboration and culture, providing a lively space that fosters team spirit. We come together in the office three days a week, with two flexible remote days. To be part of our team, it’s essential to be based in or near Stockholm.

title: SEO Specialist, omgående
description:
**Vill du hjälpa spännande företag att lyckas på Google?** 
 vår kund söker en erfaren SEO-konsult med lång erfarenhet av att arbeta med sökmotoroptimering.
   

  

**Om rollen** 
 Som SEO-konsult hos vår kund ansvarar du för att utveckla och genomföra kundspecifika SEO-strategier. Du kommer att arbeta med en bred kundbas och leadsgenerering, och du driver projekt framåt genom att samarbeta med marknadschefer, webbutvecklare, UX-designers och content-ansvariga.
   

  

 Vi uppmuntrar innovation – om du har smarta idéer på nya SEO-verktyg framförallt kopplat till AI kan du vara med och utveckla dem tillsammans med utvecklare och kolleger.
   

  

**För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du:**
* Har minst 3 års erfarenhet av SEO och ett genuint intresse för sökmotoroptimering.
* Behärskar både teknisk SEO och innehållsoptimering.
* Är van vid att projektleda och kommunicera med olika intressenter hos kund.
* Har erfarenhet av vanliga SEO-verktyg som Screaming Frog, Ahrefs, Search Console och liknande.
* Är analytisk, självgående och strukturerad i ditt arbetssätt.
* Har du erfarenhet av att driva egna affiliatesajter? Det ser vi som ett plus!


**Om uppdaget**
 Uppdraget är på heltid med hybrid modell placering i Stockholm. Arbetet utförs 3 dagar på kontoret och resterande på distans. Vi ser helst att kandidat är öppen för projektanställning gällande denna roll.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Skicka din ansökan och CV genom att ladda upp ditt CV här. När vi har mottagit och granskat din ansökan kommer de kandidater som matchar kravprofilen att gå vidare till nästa steg i processen, som inkluderar arbetspsykologiska tester.
   

  

 Nyfiken på tjänsten? Tveka inte att kontakta Rickard Sandett för mer information.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att ta emot din ansökan!
   

  

**Hiroy – Din partner inom Marknad, Kommunikation och Tech**
 Hos Hiroy förstår vi vad som krävs för att hitta rätt kompetens och skapa framgångsrika samarbeten. Genom vår djupa branschkunskap och dagliga dialog med kunder, kandidater och konsulter har vi en unik helhetsbild av marknaden.
   

  

 Som kandidat eller konsult hos oss blir du en del av vårt starka nätverk, där vi matchar dig med spännande uppdrag och rätt möjligheter för din utveckling. Vi kombinerar aktivt sökande av toppkandidater och konsulter med vårt gedigna nätverk av erfarna experter och passiva kandidater. På så sätt säkerställer vi att du får tillgång till de bästa uppdragen – samtidigt som företag snabbt hittar rätt kompetens.
   

  

 Vi håller oss ständigt uppdaterade kring de senaste trenderna, verktygen och utvecklingarna inom branschen. Genom att dela insikter och expertis hjälper vi dig att ligga steget före och skapa långsiktiga resultat i en konkurrensutsatt marknad.
   

  

 Välkommen till Hiroy – låt oss hitta rätt möjligheter tillsammans!

title: 🚀Join Arfve Accelerator: Push the Boundaries of 3D Motion & Animation!
description:
Are you passionate about 3D animation, motion design, and visual storytelling? Do you want to gain real-world experience, build your CV, and work with a fast-growing international team?
 



 Arfve Accelerator is looking for 
 **3D Motion Designers, 3D Animators, Motion Graphics Artists, CG Artists, VFX Artists, and Technical Animators** 
  to join our creative team! Help us shape groundbreaking visuals for one of the biggest crowdfunding launches ever.
 



  




**Why Join Arfve Accelerator?** 

 🚀 
 **Fast-growing team** 
  – We are already 30 people strong and expanding to 40 this week.
 



 🎨 
 **Next-level design** 
  – Our industrial designers are developing a Scandinavian-inspired, minimalist design language with straight lines, sharp edges, and an industrial feel.
 



 📈 
 **Boost your CV** 
  – Get hands-on experience in high-end 3D animation and visual effects.
 



 🏆 
 **Career-building opportunity** 
  – Top-performing interns will have the chance to continue within the Arfve organization in a future paid position.
 



 🌍 
 **International exposure** 
  – Collaborate with designers, developers, and creatives from around the world.
 



  




**The Role: 3D Motion & Animation Intern** 

 As a 
 **3D Motion & Animation Intern** 
 , you will:
 



 ✔️ Create stunning 3D animations and motion graphics for marketing, branding, and crowdfunding campaigns.
 



 ✔️ Develop high-quality visual assets for social media, product showcases, and digital experiences.
 



 ✔️ Collaborate with UX/UI designers and developers to integrate motion into our app and product experience.
 



 ✔️ Push creative boundaries with innovative CG and VFX techniques.
 



 ✔️ Work closely with the digital marketing and content teams to ensure a cohesive brand identity.
 



  




**Internship Details** 

 📅 
 **Duration:** 
  Now – June 2025
 



 ⏳ 
 **Flexible hours** 
  – Work at your own pace, fully remote.
 



 🌍 
 **Digital & International** 
  – Work from anywhere and collaborate with a global team.
 



 💡 
 **Unpaid internship** 
  – A great opportunity to 
 **build your CV, gain industry experience, and secure a future paid position within Arfve.** 




 📩 
 **How to apply?** 
  Send your application and portfolio to 
 **team@arfve.com** 




  





 Join us and be part of something bigger than a brand – a movement. 💡🔥
 



  





 #3DAnimation #MotionDesign #VFX #CGArtist #3DGeneralist #CreativeInternship #ArfveAccelerator #Crowdfunding #DesignInnovation #CareerGrowth

title: Principal Engineer
description:
***Principal Engineer***




***Stockholm (Hybrid)***




***70,000SEK-90,000SEK (to be discussed during process)***




***English Speaking***




  





 Are you a visionary Principal Engineer with a passion for crafting visually engaging products that captivate millions? Do you thrive in a dynamic, product-led environment where design, aesthetics, and performance come together to shape an outstanding user experience?
 



  





 Our client is a lean, well-funded startup revolutionizing e-commerce by enabling merchants to create seamless, visually stunning shopping experiences. Their hyper-intelligent merchandising app is used by fashion and lifestyle retailers across Europe and the USA, making intuitive and high-quality design a core part of the product.
 



  





 With a small but mighty team of 13, they are looking for a hands-on Principal Engineer to help drive their technical vision, elevate their engineering team, and ensure their platform delivers an immersive, visually rich frontend experience.
 



  





**What You’ll Do** 



* Lead the technical direction, pace, and ambition of the engineering team.
* Collaborate closely with product and design teams to craft a pixel-perfect, customer-centric interface that enhances the shopping experience.
* Propose and implement innovative solutions to evolve the product’s highly visual frontend, ensuring seamless performance and engagement.
* Balance speed and quality, making smart trade-offs to deliver exceptional user experiences.
* Contribute directly to feature development for their Shopify and Centra platforms, optimizing and integrating applications for a smooth and visually compelling interface.
* Act as a technical mentor and thought leader, motivating and inspiring a high-performing engineering team.



  





**What They’re Looking For** 



* 5-10 years of experience in building consumer-facing or B2C/B2B SaaS products, particularly with highly visual or interactive frontends.
* Deep understanding of UX and UI design principles, with an eye for detail and a passion for creating beautiful, intuitive products.
* Expertise with their stack:



**Frontend:** 
 React with TypeScript (strong focus on dynamic, visually rich interfaces).
 



**Backend:** 
 Modern, well-typed Python (e.g., FastAPI, Pydantic).
 



**Infrastructure:** 
 Kubernetes in GCP with ArgoCD.
 


* Experience in editor-style or customizable products is a strong plus.
* Entrepreneurial mindset, with the ability to navigate uncertainty and manage complexity.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills to foster trust, alignment, and collaboration.
* Passionate about leveraging AI to enhance product features and development.



  





**What They Offer** 



* Competitive salary (starting from 70,000-90,000 SEK, to be discussed during the process).
* 4.5% pension contribution.
* 4,000 SEK annual wellness allowance.
* 10,000 SEK annual learning allowance.
* 30 paid vacation days.
* Company laptop and tools.
* Quarterly off-site socials to connect and collaborate with the team.
* A hybrid working model, with flexibility to work remotely while maintaining regular engagement in their Stockholm office.



  





**Why Join Them?** 




 Our client is a lean, agile company with big ambitions. Their team values collaboration, knowledge sharing, and creating meaningful impact. Joining their team means shaping a product that’s making waves in e-commerce, supported by a group of highly skilled engineers and backed by world-class investors. If you’re passionate about building products where aesthetics and technology converge, this is the perfect opportunity for you.

title: Full-Stack Engineer
description:
*If you’re looking to make the best co-op games in the world, you’ve come to the right place. We're proud to have some of the best game makers and collaborators in the industry working with us. What's more, we're a fun bunch of game developers, who love to indulge in our passion for video games together. Our games are not for everyone. Are they for you?*
 We are now looking for a Full-Stack Engineer!
   

  

**What You'll Do**
 As a Full-Stack Engineer on Helldivers 2, you’ll craft the Game Master Live Tooling and internal systems that drive the game for millions of players. You will design intuitive interfaces that help developers shape in-game events and build tools that support a seamless in-game store. Your work will directly impact how the game unfolds for players around the world. This role is a great fit if you love creating polished, user-friendly interfaces while also having the backend knowledge to make them powerful and scalable. You’ll work on:
   

  

* Game Master Tooling: Designing intuitive dashboards that allow our game master to set up dynamic in-game events and shape the Helldivers universe in real-time.
* In-Game Store Management: Creating tools to configure store pages, promotions, and content that reach millions of players.
* Customer Support Interfaces: Developing systems that empower support teams to assist players efficiently with tickets and in-game issues.


 You’ll collaborate with designers, game developers, and engineers, working with modern frontend frameworks (Angular, TypeScript) and backend technologies (C#, Microsoft Orleans, ASP.NET Core) to create seamless experiences.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You’re a self-driven Full-Stack engineer with around three years of experience building intuitive, high-quality web applications. You thrive in a collaborative environment, enjoy sharing ideas, and taking initiative to drive solutions forward. You have strong experience with:
   

  

* Frontend development using Angular and TypeScript, with a a good understanding of UX principles and best practices
* Building and consuming RESTful APIs, to ensure smooth communication between frontend and backend systems.
* Backend development with C# and ASP.NET Core, with broad knowledge of backend principles rather than deep specialization.


 It is a plus if you have experience with:
   

  

* SQL databases and cloud platforms (Azure preferred), but a willingness to learn is just as valuable!


 If you enjoy solving complex problems, refining user experiences, and building tools that empower teams, we would love to hear from you.
   

  

****How to apply****
 If you think that this position matches your background and skills, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your CV in English as soon as possible. We ask that your application always include relevant work samples or a link to your portfolio.
   

  

 We interview candidates continuously and hire when we find a good fit.
   

  

**Practical Information**
**Scope:** 
 Full-time: 40 hours per week with initial 6 month probation period.
   

  

**Location:** 
 Office first, hybrid solution possible. You need to be eligble to work in Sweden.
   

  

**We are a pet friendly office! You can expect to find dogs and occasionally some cats around.**
**What We Offer**
 Arrowhead Game Studios is a growing team of about 100+ people, best known for our co-op titles. Despite our size, we remain a friendly and down to earth bunch, who love to indulge in our passion for video games together.
   

  

 Located in a newly built, custom-tailored offices on the Hammarby Kaj waterfront, we enjoy everything Stockholm has to offer. A thriving game dev scene, along with all types of activities are immediately available on our doorstep.
   

  

 Our talented developers are crucial to our success, therefore we put a lot of emphasis in creating and maintaining a prosperous culture. We’re committed to open and transparent communication. Your ideas are welcomed, valued, appreciated - the ceiling for creative discussions is high.
   

  

 We also have numerous work benefits for all our employees. You can read about them here!

title: Sr JavaScript Frontend Software Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
 Sr JavaScript Frontend Software Engineer
   

  

 This is Worldline
   

  

 Worldline helps businesses of all shapes and sizes to accelerate their growth journey - quickly, simply, and securely. We are the innovators at the heart of the payments technology industry, shaping how the world pays and gets paid. Our technology powers the growth of millions of businesses across 5 continents. And just as we help our customers accelerate their business, we are committed to helping our people accelerate their careers. Together, we shape the evolution.
   

  

 The Opportunity
   

  

 We are looking for an upbeat Sr JavaScript Frontend Software Engineer to join our team. During your journey, you will become familiar with all different essential topics related to merchant facing digital services and you will increase your knowledge to step up further and challenge yourself.
   

  

 Being part of a product team, you will transfer the product vision into design, development, and delivery, to own the backlog toward building the right product. As it is a new product\service, there is room for your own interpretation and freedom to steer the content of this role, based on your experience and character.
   

  

 In this role as experienced Engineer, you are expected to be able to grasp the business problem at hand and self-organize to deliver the solution. In this team we don’t delegate features to build but rather problems to solve for our engineers.
   

  

 The team
   

  

 You will be working in a team that today is working in an empowered way of working where we focus on Individual Contributors and involve engineers in the design process to have very good understanding of the What and Why before moving onto to How. Software engineers take on responsibility to design it, build it and ship it! Everyone in the team is value oriented and customer centric to solve real world merchant problems.
   

  

 Day-to-Day Responsibilities
   

  

* You develop responsive and engaging frontend solutions for our customers using modern JavaScript and TypeScript technologies (e.g., React). Examine existing code, identify flaws and build solutions to improve it.
* Cooperate optimally with your team on the active sprint to craft new software solutions.
* Support the creation of technical concepts.
* Participate with recommendations regarding knowledge, priorities, and estimates.
* Help complete full software development processes for each assigned project, adhering to company standards and expectations.


 Who Are We Looking For
   

  

 People Who Can Drive Positive Change, Step Up And Show What’s Next – People With Passion, Can-do Attitude And a Hunger To Learn And Grow. You Have a Professional Approach, Being Constructive And Finding Solutions In The Best Interest Of The Business. You Also
   

  

* Have a Bachelor’s degree in computer science, software engineering, or another related field.
* Proven experience in JavaScript and TypeScript, with expertise in modern frontend frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, or Vue.js).
* Previous experience working with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP).
* Knowledge of UI/UX principles and tools (e.g., CSS, HTML, or design systems).
* Practical experience with version control systems like Git.
* Strong communication skills, with the ability to connect with both technical and non-technical colleagues.
* Strong analytical skills to effectively process and structure large amounts of information.
* Are a quick learner and self-starting, showing drive and initiatives supporting business goals.
* Are a great teammate who supports his team and puts the business objectives first.
* Basic backend knowledge (Spring Boot, Java) to facilitate collaboration with backend colleagues.


 Perks & Benefits
   

  

 At Worldline, You’ll Get The Chance To Be At The Heart Of The Global Payments Technology Industry And Shape How The World Pays And Gets Paid. On Top Of That, You Will Also
   

  

* Health contribution
* Health check – Every 2:nd year
* Private Health Care Insurance (EuroAccident)
* Parental pay and 12 months pension during parental leave
* Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard
* Benefit portal with many great offers, plus more.


 Shape the evolution
   

  

 We are pushing towards the next frontiers of payments technology, and we look for big thinkers to join our journey. People with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. Here you’ll work with ambitious colleagues from around the world, take on unique challenges as a team, and make a real impact on the society. And with our empowering culture, strong technology and extensive training opportunities, we help you accelerate your career. Wherever you decide to go. Join our global team of over 18,000 innovators across 40+ countries, and shape a tomorrow that is yours to own.
   

  

 Learn more about life at Worldline at jobs.worldline.com
   

  

 We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as an individual with a disability, or any applicable legally protected characteristics.

title: Senior Systemutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Minst 12 års erfarenhet
* Minst 7 års erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med systemutveckling i C# & .NET.
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av systemutveckling på EpiServern/Optimizley.
* Prata och skriva flytande svenska.
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av systemutveckling i Javascript.
* God kännedom och erfarenhet om Microsofts teknikstack, beskriv kortfattat hur kravet uppfylls.
* God kännedom och erfarenhet om IT-säkerhetsprinciper, cybersäkerhet och säker utveckling, beskriv kortfattat hur kravet uppfylls.


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med konfiguration av CSP (Content Security Policy).
* Erfarenhet av att designa system/applikationsarkitektur.
* Erfarenhet av och ha arbetat aktivt med Docker/Kubernetes, beskriv kortfattat hur kravet uppfylls.
* Erfarenhet av utveckling i Elastic Search.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med UX-design.


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 06-03-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: SAP BTP Integrationsexpert
description:
SAP BTP, integrationer och andra spännande teknikmöjligheter, här är du som bäst!
   

  

 Vårt team av utvecklare har bred kunskap inom SAP BTP (Business Technology Platform) och Fiori och söker nu fler kollegor främst inom integrationsområdet.
   

  

 Som SAP BTP Integrationsexpert kommer du att arbeta direkt med våra kunder för att designa, implementera och stödja integrationslösningar som kopplar samman SAP- och icke-SAP-system. Du kommer att arbeta nära kunden för att förstå och analysera deras integrationsbehov och utveckla skräddarsydda lösningar med hjälp av SAP BTP Integration Suite.
   

  

 Om du har en bakgrund inom rådgivning eller konsulting och brinner för att hjälpa företag att optimera sina integrationslösningar är detta din chans att göra en verklig skillnad!
   

  

 Bli en del av vårt dynamiska team och hjälp oss att driva innovation och framgång.
   

  

**Om Stretch Evolve**
 Med slutanvändaren i fokus och innovation som drivkraft skapar vi framtiden. Vi utgår från SAP:s Cloud lösningar, guidar och coachar våra kunder genom hela den utvecklande livscykeln. Tillsammans har vi kompetensen, erfarenheten och dessutom en extra spets inom S/4HANA, SAP BTP, Fiori, SAP Analytics Cloud, UX och förändringsledning, vilket gör att vi kan säkerställa största möjliga utväxling för våra kunder i de initiativ vi är involverade i. Här kan du göra skillnad!
   

  

 Nyfiken på att bli en del av vårt SAP team?
   

  

**Vi Tror Att Du**
* har praktisk erfarenhet av att designa, bygga och testa integrationer mellan SAP och andra system/applikationer för både on-premise och hybrida Cloud lösningar
* har erfarenhet av att integrationsmonitorering, felhantering och lösa problem kopplat till integrationslösningar
* har minst 3 års erfarenhet av SAP Integration Suite, fd SAP CPI (Cloud Platform Integration)
* har erfarenhet av REST API:er, API utveckling, API Management
* har minst 1 års erfarenhet av att leda och driva integrationsprojekt
* är självgående, analytisk, strukturerad, proaktiv, lösningsorienterad
* erfarenhet av att arbeta direkt med kunder och en förmåga att skapa starka kundrelationer
* behärskar svenska språket


**Någon eller några av nedan erfarenheter hjälper dig att lyckas i denna roll:**
* Erfarenhet av SAP PO/PI/XI
* Praktisk erfarenhet av övergång från SAP PO till SAP BTP Integration Suite
* Erfarenhet av SOAP, RFC, BADI, IDOC, OData, JSON, XML
* Erfarenhet av utveckling i ABAP, Java, Javascript, Groovy Script, XSLT
* Erfarenhet av protokoll och säkerhetsformat som SSL, OAuth, SAML, JWT, SSH
* Erfarenhet av containertekniker som Docker och Kubernetes
* Erfarenhet av middleware-teknologier som Apache Kafka, MuleSoft etc
* Relevanta SAP-certifieringar, såsom SAP Certified Application Associate - SAP Integration Associate, är en fördel


 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Hälsar teamet på Stretch Evolve
